alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Iron County through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northeast of Beaver Dam, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Modena. This includes Utah Route 56 between mile markers 2 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
